phrases: He was just like that, too.
My hero was just like that.
He was disqualified the instant he stopped playing.
Only one person matters to me.
There will now be an intermission.
A competition is a sacred garden of music.
Under no circumstances is it a place to find yourself.
Still the same prickly old geezer, huh?
And he is escalated with old age.
For a second, I did not recognize you.
Hey, a woman changes her'do every time she finds a man.
And besides, it is been two years.
Somehow I think I have seen her before...
Damn you, Kousei, keeping her from me.
I thought you were my friend!
She is that lady who was always with Kousei's mom.
Since she was classmates with Arima-kun's mother, Saki Arima, in college,
it makes sense that they would know each other.
Here, there are all these Kouseis that I know nothing about.
Are you going to turn him into a pianist?
Not if I can help it.
That is such a demanding job.
You have got to turn him into a pianist.
All right, our nostalgic reunion is over now.
Your friends are glaring at us with the scariest faces.
You are going to stay for the results, right?
I am out of the running anyway, and I am not here for results.
Yeah, the way you bombed was all kinds of extraordinary!
Even so, you should be there when the results go up.
By the way, which one is it?
The girl with the long hair?
Which is the girl you are in love with?
Your piano was singing it out.
Or are you pretending not to notice?
The you that you never knew.
The piano will drag out everything in your youth.
She is the girl who likes my best friend.
And I am Friend A, after all.
We will now post the names of those who cleared the first round of the preliminaries.
Maiho Music Competition Qualifiers Pianists Takeshi Aiza
So Arima's name is not listed, after all...
I stopped playing midway, after all.
What, I did not make it again this year?
I am going to work hard towards next year's competition.
And this was my last chance...
What was up with that performance?
What have you been doing all this time?
Flip-flopping between playing styles like that...
Turning in such a train wreck of a performance!
Where did the almighty Arima go?
The lonely pianist, my hero - where did he go?
My hero is made of super alloy... my hero never loses!
You knew that if you stopped playing, you would not make it past the prelims.
Why do you have that look on your face?
Heroes always win, no matter what.
This is like... it is like you are actually human.
So it was a train wreck.
Then that means I turned in another sloppy performance.
Rumor has it that Arima cannot hear the notes.
He really cannot hear the notes...
But I was not slacking at all.
I practiced till I passed out.
You are just you, no matter what.
And if I still turned in a sloppy performance after all that, then...
That is who I am now.
It is the current me, playing with everything I have got.
Mozart said, Go on a journey.
I have no idea what lies ahead.
But I have taken the first steps.
We are still in the middle of our journey.
I am a musician, just like you.
That is why I am moving on.
I will bet he is found it.
For just an instant, you could see a mischievous child peering out.
He is depressed because he lost for the first time ever, that Kousei.
I am totally cool with this.
A competition is a sacred garden of music.
It is not a place to find yourself.
What was up with that performance?
What have you been doing all this time?
I missed my chance at becoming a star.
What is up with these emotions?
I am the same as you, Tsubaki, Watari.
I am a person, just like you.
What do you mean by that comment?
There is a letter here for you, Kaori.
I am going to get changed.
You would not pick up no matter how many times I called you,
so I am here out of worry, you little punk!
Hey, are not those the clothes you were wearing yesterday?
Would it kill you to take a bath?
Want me to give you a wash just like old times?
And I will take my clothes off myself, too!
You were playing all night, until you passed out, huh?
Boys will be boys, after all.
Se- Hiroko-san, you take your coffee black, right?
Do not hold it where it is hot.
Is Takahiko-san still away on business?
Ever the free range parent, I see.
Will milk be okay for you, Koharu-chan?
Well, it has been two years.
To tell you the truth, I never thought you would take up the piano again.
So what made you turn to the piano again?
There will be no breaks for us.
The day before yesterday, an invitation from the Towa Hall office arrived.
Towa Hall... as in that competition you and Kousei played in?
Is that by any chance... the gala concert?
a special performance held to commemorate something.
In this case, it is a recital to mark the heights achieved by the winners
and other top performers at the Towa Music Competition.
Hmm, so if it were a sport, it would be like an exhibition match?
And as the promoters' choice, we have been invited.
So the almighty duo is back in business!
What are you going to do?
Is our song for the gala concert set?
I want to do this one.
We are playing this at the gala?
Normally, you would do something more major, more showy.
That is okay, that is okay.
We are just the throw-ins, anyway.
There is no way anyone else will be playing this song,
and we are bound to stand out more if we play something chill.
These galas are all about standing out, do not you know?
I do not deserve to be a violinist.
Please bear with me for just a little longer.
So tiny, she looks like she will crumble away at my touch.
What made you turn to the piano?
I met a really weird violinist.
But the smile she shows to people she likes is angelic.
When I got onstage after she kicked, punched, and dragged me up there...
On that familiar stage, I saw a sight that I would never seen before.
I want to see that sight again with my own eyes one more time.
That is what made me think...
That I would like to become a really weird pianist!
Then who else but me to serve as your guardian?
Hey, what is with that horrified reaction?
Teach me to play the piano.
will you start taking this seriously?
We played together for the first time.
That is about what you should expect.
But it is shining with all its might.
This is the light of life.
You know what, I felt it there.
That everyone has something deep in their hearts.
For some it might be hostility.
To think, Let it reach them.
We all had our personal emotions to lean on.
Maybe it is not possible for someone to get up on stage in an innocent state.
What did you have in your heart?
I am... going on a journey.
Pursuing that moment when my music reached them.
Pursuing that sight of her with her back to me.
I have pulled even with her... until that day comes.
You know, I Am not always going to be around to help you...
